Medium: Brown paper cover with letterpress text and black ink manuscript title mounted on front; 1 lithographed ferro-concrete poem by Kamenskii and Zdanevich mounted on brown paper, and 1 lithographed zaum poem by Kruchenykh mounted on brown paper; 1 leaf of lithographed manuscript text by Zdanevich mounted on inside back cover
Artist: Vasilii Kamenskii, Aleksei Kruchenykh, Kirill Zdanevich
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation (Boris Kerdimun Archive)
